mapper.delete: delete from tab_user where id in (${ids});
mapper.select: select count(*)>0 from tab_user where userName = #{userName}
mapper.update: update tab_user set active = #{status} where id = #{id}
update tab_user set password = #{password} where id = #{id}
update tab_user set avatar = #{avatar} where id = #{id};
mapper.select: SELECT ua.* FROM dt_user_address ua where ua.userId = #{userId}
mapper.update: update dt_user_address set address = #{address.address}, consignee = #{address.consignee},phoneNumber = #{address.phoneNumber} where id = #{address.id}
update dt_user_address set isDefault = FALSE where userId = #{userId};
update dt_user_address set isDefault = true where userId = #{address.userId} and id = #{address.id};
mapper.select: select balance from dt_balance where userId = #{userId}
mapper.update: update dt_balance set balance = #{balance} where userId = #{userId}
